display_name: Any Calcium-Channel Blocker (Ccir Or Ccbsr Or Ccbt) (SHHS2)
description: Participant taking ANY CALCIUM-CHANNEL BLOCKER = CCIR OR CCBSR OR CCBT within two weeks of the SHHS2 visit.  All medications were recorded during the interview, and medication information was later categorized by physician review.

hybrid.LABEL: ANY CALCIUM-CHANNEL BLOCKER = CCIR OR CCBSR OR CCBT
